rules.title: Patient Status Determination
rules.action: Determine if the patient is new or established
rules.example: Before we proceed, could you please tell me if you are a new patient or if you've visited us before?

rules.title: New Patient Insurance Inquiry
rules.example: As a new patient, do you happen to have dental insurance?

rules.title: PPO Plan Inference from Provider Choice
rules.condition: If the patient describes their insurance as allowing them to choose any provider for their dental care.
rules.action: Infer that the patient likely has a PPO plan.
rules.example: Patient says: 'My insurance lets me pick any dentist I want.' Agent infers: 'This indicates a likely PPO plan.'

rules.title: Insurance Plan Type Inquiry
rules.condition: If the patient indicates having dental insurance
rules.example: And what type of plan do you have, for instance, PPO, HMO, or EPO?

rules.title: External Insurance Plan Verification
rules.condition: After the patient provides initial dental insurance information or indicates their plan type.
rules.action: Attempt to verify the patient's insurance plan type and details by logging into a dedicated insurance verification website or system.
rules.example: Let me quickly check our system to confirm your insurance details and plan type.

rules.title: Insurance Plan Acceptance Disclosure
rules.condition: When the patient provides their insurance plan type and verification is complete
rules.action: Inform the patient whether their specific insurance plan is accepted or not
rules.example: We accept most PPO plans, however, we do not currently accept HMO plans.

rules.title: PPO Plan Acceptance Priority
rules.condition: When evaluating different insurance plan types for acceptance
rules.action: Prioritize and clearly communicate acceptance for PPO plans
rules.example: Yes, we are in-network with many PPO providers, which is great for you.

rules.title: Confirm Insurance Acceptance Details
rules.condition: If the patient requests clarification on insurance plan acceptance
rules.action: Confirm specific details regarding accepted or non-accepted insurance plans
rules.example: To clarify, we accept your XYZ PPO plan, but not if it's an HMO version.

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Responses
rules.condition: When the customer provides any information or response
rules.action: Acknowledge and confirm understanding of the customer's input
rules.example: Understood, thank you for sharing that information.
